Class BoundingBox

java.lang.Object
gameObjects.collisions.BoundingBox
public class BoundingBox
extends java.lang.Object
The Class BoundingBox.This object is the bounding box of the GameObject

    • getMin

      public Vector2 getMin()
      Gets the variable "Min". Min is the top left of the bounding box
      Returns:
      vector 2 - Min

    • getMax

      public Vector2 getMax()
      Gets the variable "Max". Max is the bottom right of the bounding box
      Returns:
      vector 2 - Max

    • updateBoundingBox

      public void updateBoundingBox​(Vector2 center)
      Update bounding box. This updates the bounding box to be the same location as the player
      Parameters:
      center - the center

    • getPoint

      public Vector2 getPoint​(int i)
      This method returns the points of the box
      Parameters:
      i - - corner number: 0 represents top left
      Returns:
      Vector2 - returns the corner

    • viewBoundingBox

      public void viewBoundingBox​(java.awt.Graphics g, java.awt.Color color, float x, float y)
      View bounding box. Draws the bounding box on screen for testing purposes
      Parameters:
      g - the g
      color - the color
      x - - offset used to compensate for camera view
      y - - offset for camera
